description:
for rolling distributions not so useful as there are updates for every day it is pretty annoying also setting it to just check every week didn't apply completely... it checks again after a restart and other times, no idea why.
Would be better to be able to set it to check only once a week e.g. on friday or every two weeks...
weekly okay but is it from monday to monday or saturday to saturday or ..... ?

Should take into account that under openSUSE Tumbleweed you should only update from command line.
It should not have an update button in this case or the update button should trigger a zypper dup.
Otherwise it finds updates reliably.
